mobs.LongDesc: Puck stands here smelling awful!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Looking at Puck, you realize that this guy really does need to shower more
often.  It makes you wonder how the other cast members on the real world
could stand him for as long as they did!  Besides, he's one of the most
obnoxious people you've ever met.  You'd kick him out of your house too
if he lived with you.  What the hell does Rachel see in this guy?

mobs.LongDesc: Mohammed lays on the bed smoking a joint.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Looking at Mohammed, you can't help but be impressed with his dreadlocks.
He's making some melodious sounds on the keyboards and criticizing Puck
at the same time.  Maybe if you were more in tune with Allah you would
understand, but right now Mohammed's just a bit too far out for you to
comprehend.

mobs.LongDesc: Judd is sitting on the sofa and picking his nose.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
When you look at Judd, you see a guy who obviously thinks he's much more
intellectual than he really is.  This guy likes to pass judgement on 
everyone and everything.  He seems to always think he has the right answer,
when in reality he's just plain annoying!

mobs.LongDesc: Pedro stands here popping some AZT.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Looking at Pedro, you see a generally nice guy.  Actually, he might just
be one of the few normal people in this house.  The only really annoying
thing he does is complain about Puck all the time and act like he's the
centre of the universe.  Oh well...maybe he's not so perfect after all.
He sure doesn't look very strong though...

mobs.LongDesc: Jo stands here cooking a yummy vegan meal.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
When you gaze at Jo you can easily decide that she's quite attractive.
Maybe it's the fact that she doesn't eat meat that keeps her complexion
so lovely.  Or...maybe it's that sexy accent she has.  Either way, she's
a MUCH welcome addition to the house since they kicked Puck out!

mobs.LongDesc: Pam stands here in her white coat.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Pam is clearly the most intelligent person in this house.  It kind of
makes you wonder, however, why in the world she colours her hair red?  Who
in the world would trust a doctor with multi-coloured hair?  Not to worry
though...soon after the season ended she dropped out of med school to go
on a speaking tour around the US.

mobs.LongDesc: Rachel is here talking on the telephone.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Rachel is just a little too bit on the conservative side for you.  It kind
of makes you wonder how she hit it off with Pedro so well.  From the Young
Republicans pin on her blouse to the navy blazer, there's no doubt this
woman is going to be a big political schmoozer one day.

mobs.LongDesc: Mike stands here holding a bottle of ranch salad dressing.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Looking at Mike, you see the all-American frat boy.  From the trendy haircut
to the grungy jeans and shirt there's no doubt what country this guy comes
from.  He has no interest in being in England, because everything here's 
just so different.  You've always wanted to kill him, so here's your chance!

mobs.LongDesc: Jacinda stands here being the centre of her own universe.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Kill kill kill!  Jacinda is without a doubt the biggest bitch who's ever
been on the Real World.  She's so self-centred it's as if nobody in the
house even matters.  She can do whatever she wants, because her way is
always the right way.  She's been shitting on the whole cast all season,
so give her what she deserves!  She may be a model, but that never stopped
OJ Simpson!

mobs.LongDesc: Cori stands here bitching about something trivial.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
When you look at Cori, you know she's is undoubtedly the biggest whiner
in the house.  Whenever anything doesn't go her way she pouts and moans
until everyone feels sorry for her.  You definitely feel sorry for her 
though, since she obviously has terrible taste in clothes!

mobs.LongDesc: Hugh Grant is here, soliciting a whore.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Looking at Hugh, you see a dirty man with a dirty mind.  If it's female
he wants it.  Hugh thinks he's a stud, but you have other ideas!

mobs.LongDesc: Sharron sits here talking on the phone.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Looking at Sharron you see a perfect example of British behaviour.  Although
everyone else is constantly picking on her, she managed to keep her
composure and take it very well.  Maybe she'll finally break and slap
Jacinda later this season.  You can't help but feel sorry for her, although
you admire her inner strength.

mobs.LongDesc: Lars stands here cooking a bratwurst.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Lars is without a doubt the most mature person in this house, and probably
the only one who gives a rat's ass about the other people.  He's constantly
thinking of others, although others rarely consider him when making choices.
He seems to bond with just about everyone, and always gives people a second
chance.  He's dressed in leather from head to toe, and smoking up a storm,
but somehow it doesn't seem to bother you.

mobs.LongDesc: Kat stands in the closet being indecisive.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You're not quite sure WHAT to make of Kat.  She never seems to make up her
mind.  There's one thing for sure though...she wants nothing more than to
follow Neil around the house and drool over him.  Whatever he does she wants
to do too.  You feel like telling her to get a life!

mobs.LongDesc: An MTV cameraman stands here taking in the action.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Looking at the cameraman, you realize that this guy is about as Generation X
as they come.  From the ripped blue jeans to the faded t-shirt everything
seems to fit the image.  However, he's got a job and he's working in London
so he can't be doing too badly!

mobs.LongDesc: Satan stands here disguised as Bill Gates!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Looking at Satan, it's obvious he's managed to pull the wool over the eyes
of most of the planet.  This is clearly one of the most evil creatures on
the planet.  Yet, he's managed to convince the entire Earth that he's Bill
Gates, the cute little computer geek.  Don't you believe it for one second!
This guy's had it coming for a long time, and now you're going to give it
to him!

mobs.LongDesc: A Skeleton stands here, dancing to the Grateful Dead.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This is perhaps the oddest skeleton you've ever seen!  It's wearing a top
hat and swaying to the beat of Jerry's guitar and melodic vocals.  What
a long strange trip it's been...

mobs.LongDesc: Michael Jackson stands here wondering if he's black or white.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
When you first glance at Michael you have a very hard time deciding if he's
black or white.  That's ok though, because after all of these operations he
probably doesn't know either.  You're not sure if he's male or female 
either, and I doubt that Lisa Marie could tell you!

mobs.LongDesc: Madonna sits on the bed touching herself.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Looking at Madonna, you realize for the first (but not last!) time what a
tramp this woman is.  Everything about her just screams that she's no more
than a prostitute.  You knew when you saw Truth or Dare that she was 
someone you'd never sleep with unless you wanted some unpleasant surprises
down the road!

mobs.LongDesc: Neil sits at the table being intellectual.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
At first glance, Neil doesn't seem to be quite the intellectual fellow he
claims to be.  He's always putting everyone down and making them feel as if
they're less important than he is.  However, he does make really good music.
If his tongue never heals though, it'll be no big loss!

mobs.ShortDesc: a Winged Corpse of a Dead VJ
mobs.LongDesc: The winged corpse of a dead VJ flies around the room.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
So...this is what happens to VJs when they die.  Their boney corpses sprout
wings and fly around purgatory for infinity. What a frightening thought!
Kill it while you still can!

mobs.LongDesc: Billy Ray Cyrus sits on a tree stump stroking his guitar.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
That Achey Breaky Song...they played it far too long!  This guy has one of
the most annoying voices you've ever heard!  It's as if he inhaled a
harmonica or something his voice is so twangy!  If you get really lucky
maybe you can sneak out of the room before he realizes you're hear!

mobs.LongDesc: Martha Quinn sits here complaining about something like usual.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You know, Martha wouldn't be so bad if she wasn't so damn annoying!  Every
time she opens her mouth she has to complain about something or another,
and how it's not how SHE likes it.  Take a chill pill Martha!

mobs.LongDesc: Kennedy stands here annoying you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Why won't she just get out of your face?  There's no doubt that Kennedy 
just clings to everyone she comes into contact with.  That wouldn't suck
quite so badly if she was normal, but she's not!  She's obnoxious beyond
all belief!

mobs.LongDesc: A Dancing Bear is here, strung-out beyond all belief!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This bear has obviously been to too many Grateful Dead shows.  He's strung
out beyond all belief, and just seems to sway back and forth.  It's 
obvious to you that's he's lost all touch with reality.

mobs.LongDesc: A Teen-Aged Girl stands here soaping her body.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Whoah...you're going to score now!  These chicks are like naked and stuff!
Yeah yeah...they probably dig guys like you.  Maybe they'll let you soap
their backs for them!

mobs.LongDesc: Mr Buzzcutt is here, pumping some iron!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This is one ex-Marine you don't want to mess with!  Mr. Buzzcutt has biceps
the size of tankers and a crew cut to match.  This man has terror in his
eyes, and you dread what will happen if you try and mess with him!

mobs.LongDesc: Principal McVicker sits here quaking in fear!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
What is this guy so afriad of?  You can't believe that McVicker actually
runs this place.  He looks like a bunny rabbit could walk all over him.
Just what are the students afraid of?

mobs.LongDesc: Mr. VanDriesen is here, smoking a joint.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
What a wuss!  VanDriesen is a hippie!  This guy obviously has a very 
difficult time realizing that the sixties are over.  Either that or he's
just overly in touch with his feminine side.  There's no doubt in your
mind that you could kick his ass!

mobs.LongDesc: Stuart stands here in his Winger T-Shirt
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Looking at Stuart, you realize just how much of a dork he is.  This kid
would follow you around and do anything you tell him to.  Maybe that's not
such a bad thing after all.  You could always use him when you don't want to
do something...

mobs.LongDesc: Stuart's Mom stands here preparing a hot breakfast burrito!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Stuart's mom is pretty boring and plain.  However, she's promised to make
you some food and that rules!  I just hope it's not one of those crappy
breakfast burritos again!

mobs.LongDesc: Mr Anderson stands here drinking a beer.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This guy's mind is clearly on another planet.  Between the fact that
he's half-blind, half-deaf, and prone to having flashbacks, you're not
sure he doesn't belong in an asylum!  Anderson's just plain nuts!  Not
to mention that fact that he has HORRIBLE fashion sense!

mobs.LongDesc: Beavis stands here saying "Yeah Yeah."
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Looking at Beavis you can't help but realize that this is one cool dude!
Well, maybe it's not so cool that he has his finger up his nose and he's
scratching his crotch, but he's still pretty cool anyways.  Maybe one day
you can be as cool as him!

mobs.LongDesc: Butthead stands here saying "Shutup Dillhole!"
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Uhhhh.....oh yeah....this is like Butthead.  Welcome to my zone.  Uhhh....
If you're a chick, can we like score or something?  Hey baby...come to
Butthead!  Want me to show you my chest?

mobs.LongDesc: A Quik-Mart Clerk stands here speaking Hindi.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Hello...and velcome to zee Qveek Mart.  You wouldn't expect any convenience
store clerk to speak English, and this one is no exception.  He is, however,
very proud of his store.  If you ask nicely, he might even show you his
42 scars from all the times he's been shot in robbery attempts.

mobs.LongDesc: The Burger World Manager stands here flipping a burger.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This man is stuck here for life.  It makes you wonder what sort of horrible
thing he did when he was younger to get condemned to such a life.  He'll
never earn a decent income and he'll never amount to anything.  What a loser!

mobs.LongDesc: A fan stands here screaming for an encore.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Yes!  These guys are cool!  They like GWAR almost as much as you do!  They
rule!  Yeah yeah...GWAR fans kick ass!

mobs.LongDesc: The lead singer of GWAR is here, screaming into the mic.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Yes!  GWAR kicks ass!  This guy is way cool man.  You wish you could be
as cool as him, screaming words into the microphone that nobody can even
understand.  That would be cool.  His clothes kicks ass too.  You wish that
you had a spiked leather jacket like his!

mobs.LongDesc: Daria stands here lecturing you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Daria's a dork.  She dresses funny and is way too smart for her own good.
It's a wonder that she has any friends at all.  Wait a second...she doesn't
have any friends.  Oh yeah...that's cool.  Daria sucks!

mobs.LongDesc: Lolita stands here in her halter top.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
If you've never seen white trash before here it is!  Lolita is dressed like
a cheap hooker.  Yes...maybe you're finally going to get some.  Nope...she
may be cheap but she's still smarter than you are.  That's not saying much
though, is it?

mobs.LongDesc: Tangaray stands here in cut-off blue jeans.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This is Lolita's slightly younger, slightly trashier friend.  You probably
won't score with her either.  You just suck.  None of the chicks like you.
She's probably going to take all of your money and just leave you out to
dry.  That sucks.

mobs.LongDesc: Todd stands here working on his car.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Todd is cool.  Maybe if you're really lucky he'll let you hang with him
for a bit.  No...I doubt it...you're too much of a dork.  He'll probably
just steal your drink and nachos and then drive off.

mobs.LongDesc: Downtown Julie Brown stands here polishing her nails.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Looking at Julie Brown you realize for the first time just how hideous she
really is!  This woman clearly needs to get some fashion sense...and soon!
Her cheap clothes make her look like a bag lady who just got back from a
shopping bonanza at the Salvation Army!

mobs.LongDesc: Kurt Loeder stands here looking stoned.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This is your big chance to finally ask Kurt the question.  Is he always
stoned or does he just look that way?  While you're at it you should ask
if that's HIS head, or if his neck threw up.  The way he dresses might be
cool, but he just has no clue so it's not.

mobs.LongDesc: Bill Bellamy stands here humming a cheezy tune.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Face it, this guy's just plain boring.  There's nothing exciting about him
that would make him any more interesting than anyone else.  Why is he a 
VJ then?  Beats me...he must know someone in a high place.

mobs.LongDesc: Tabitha Soren sits here purring seductively.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Looking at Tabitha Soren you think at first that she's quite a babe.  You
wouldn't mind scoring her if you had the chance.  Then you realize that
she's sunk low enough to be a VJ.  That's all you need to know before you
decide that even talking to her would be a BIG mistake!

mobs.LongDesc: Daisy Fuentes sits on the bed beckoning you closer.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
At first glance you know that Daisy is the one.  In some way or another,
all of the other VJs are freaks.  Daisy's different, however.  She's a
major babe...grade A-1 rack!  You want to dive into the bed and teach her
all about the American way!

mobs.LongDesc: OJ Simpson is here fleeing from justice!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Looking at OJ you are scared as hell.  This guy is obviously guilty, but
he has proven that money will buy you anything!

mobs.LongDesc: Johnny Cochrane is here yelling "If the glove don't fit...you gotta acquit!"
mobs.DetailedDesc: Johnny is one bad dude!

mobs.LongDesc: a college dude stands here hoping to score!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This guy may have a lot of things, but brains isn't one of them!  The only
reason he's here is to show off to his friends a maybe get a little tail in
the process.  You feel sorry for all the women here!

mobs.LongDesc: a college chick stands here in a tiny bikini
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This is grade-A rack if you've ever seen it!  This hot college babe is 
wearing a tiny string-bikini and looking to score.  She's probably starved
herself for weeks to look like this, so now's the time to reward her!

mobs.LongDesc: Jenny McCarthy stands here flirting with the guests.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Jenny is one hot babe!  Actually, she's better than all the contestants!  I
wonder if you could just choose her instead?  That would be a pretty good
score if you ask me!

mobs.LongDesc: Elvis stands here wearing his blue suede shoes.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This is Elvis...the KING!  It's a good thing he's not really dead after all.
Elvis is wearing blue suede shoes and singing Jailhouse Rock.  Maybe if you
ask him really nicely he'll give you a donut.

mobs.LongDesc: Jerry Garcia stands here playing "Uncle John's Band."
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Looking at Jerry Garcia you see a man who is totally at peace with himself.
The lyrics might not be very deep, and the music might not be too complex,
but there is an aura about this place that puts you very at ease.  You
can't help but admire Jerry.

mobs.LongDesc: Jay sits here working on his play.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Looking at Jay you see a quiet, but pensive guy.  He may not say much, but
when he does it's usually worth listening to.  Jay is one of the few people
in this house who actually seems to care about other peoples' feelings.
It's really too bad he hasn't managed to do much here, but maybe things
will turn around for him.
